compatibility.notes: Zimbra-1.4 allows for weak copyleft, meaning that it can be combined with permissive licenses without imposing the same copyleft requirements on the combined work.

key_requirements: You must have the authority to bind your corporation or entity to this Agreement if acting on their behalf.
When distributing Modifications, you stand in the shoes of Zimbra regarding the rights granted.
license.name: Zimbra-1.4
obligations: Include a complete copy of the Zimbra Public License with any distribution of the Software or Modifications.
Distribute Modifications in source code format under the same terms as the original Software.
Provide access to the source code when distributing compiled or object code format.
